channel.title: How do i make a ::master and ::pure command?
channel.description: Please help how do i make a ::master which gives me all combat skills 99 and pure which gives 99 att str hp range mage???? help

item.title: How do i make a ::master and ::pure command?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

@Commands above, UGLY.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a ::master and ::pure command?
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

easy if you have a 317 put this in under like a command similar

this code levels all levels to max exp

[code] }

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 0) {
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 0); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 1); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 2); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 3); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 4); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 5); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 6); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 7); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 8); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 9); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 10); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 11);
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 12); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 13); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 14); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 15); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 16); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 17); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 18); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 19); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 20); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 21); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 22);
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 23); 
        addSkillXP(1961499999, 24);
        sendMessage("text here"); 
    }[/code]

item.title: How do i make a ::master and ::pure command?
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Taken from my server project.

Master: if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }

Pure: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Read full topic
